name: Complete URL
description: want to find URLs in different formats (with or without "http" and even "ftp")sample:regexr.com[adobe.com / go / flex][gskinner.com / products / spl]http://receita.gov.brhttp://gmail.com.brftp://exemplo.dewww.empresa.suporte.com.br/exemplo.html/https://regex.sample.en/source/code/home.htmand more...
author: Sarandy
